org.shared.net.filter

Interface Filter<I,O>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the inbound type.
    O - the outbound type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    OobFilter<I,O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientServerTest.Utf8Handler, IdentityFilterFactory, SslFilter, XmlFilterFactory

    public interface Filter<I,O>
    Defines a networking I/O filter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Filters traffic in the inbound direction.

      Filters traffic in the outbound direction.
